description: Provides a list of operations in progress or queued. For usage examples, see ListControlOperation examples.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An input filter for the ListControlOperations API that lets you select the types of control operations to view. controlIdentifiers (list) --- The set of controlIdentifier returned by the filter. (string) --- controlOperationTypes (list) --- The set of ControlOperation objects returned by the filter. (string) --- enabledControlIdentifiers (list) --- The set controlIdentifier of enabled controls selected by the filter. (string) --- statuses (list) --- Lists the status of control operations. (string) --- targetIdentifiers (list) --- The set of targetIdentifier objects returned by the filter. (string) ---

nested_params.name: controlIdentifiers
nested_params.description: The set of controlIdentifier returned by the filter.

nested_params.name: controlOperationTypes
nested_params.description: The set of ControlOperation objects returned by the filter.

nested_params.name: enabledControlIdentifiers
nested_params.description: The set controlIdentifier of enabled controls selected by the filter.

nested_params.name: statuses
nested_params.description: Lists the status of control operations.

nested_params.name: targetIdentifiers
nested_params.description: The set of targetIdentifier objects returned by the filter.

nested_items.name: controlOperations
nested_items.description: Returns a list of output from control operations.

nested_items.name: enabledControlIdentifier
nested_items.description: The controlIdentifier of an enabled control.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the control operation was completed.

nested_items.name: operationIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of a control operation.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time at which a control operation began.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the specified control operation.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A speficic message displayed as part of the control status.

nested_items.name: targetIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the target of a control operation.
